full_text:
Patient Request for Health Information
Did you know you can request and access your medical records online through your patient portal? Visit: https://livewell.aah.org.
(One Patient Per Form)
Patient Name:

Date of Birth:

Street Address:

City, State, Zip:

Telephone:

Email:

Treatment Facility/Physician:
Treatment Dates:
Information Requested (select all that apply):
Medical Records
¨ Facility Summary (Includes all items in bold)
¨ Discharge Summary
¨ Pathology Reports
¨ History & Physical
¨ Radiology Reports
¨ Consultation Reports
¨ Immunizations
¨ Office/Progress Notes
¨ Sleep Study Reports
¨ Emergency Record
¨ Entire Medical Record
¨ Operative Reports
¨ Other

Imaging (requires CD format)
¨ Radiology Images
(X-Ray/CT/MRI/US)
¨ Cardiology Images
(Echo/Cath Lab)
¨ Neurology Images (EEGs)
¨ Fetal Ultrasound Images
¨ Other Imaging:

Billing
¨ Itemized Bill(s)
¨ UB04 Form
¨ CMS 1500 Form
¨ Other Billing:

¨ Laboratory Reports
Send my requested information to:
¨ Myself
¨ Other:
Name of Facility, Person, Company
Phone Number

Street Address or PO Box, City, State, Zip Code
Fax Number

Requested Formt/Delivery Method: (Fees may apply)
By Mail:
Electronically:
¨ Paper Copy
¨ Encrypted Email
¨ CD
¨ Patient Portal

Email Address
Other:
¨ In Person Pick-up at:
¨ Paper
¨ CD

I understand the information to be disclosed may include information regarding genetic testing, genetic services and family medical
history, mental health/developmental disabilities, Substance Use Disorder, HIV Test results and AIDS/AIDS-related illness.
Date

Time

Patient or Legal Representative Signature

Relationship to Patient

		Print Name
Note: If the patient lacks legal capacity or is unable to sign, an authorized personal representative may sign. Supporting
documentation may be required.
Minor Authorization: If a minor consented to treatment by a licensed physician for pregnancy, sexually transmitted diseases,
outpatient behavioral or mental health care, or outpatient treatment for controlled substances or alcohol without parental consent,
the minor may sign this authorization. If the minor is receiving substance use disorder treatment with parental or guardian
consent, both the minor and the parent or guardian may sign this authorization.
Date

Time

Signature of Minor

		Print Name

*S88411*

PATIENT REQUEST FOR HEALTH INFORMATION
(Authorization to Release Protected Health Information)

S88411-EN (Rev. 11/25)
